special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy.
special_abilities.desc: The render has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath.
special_abilities.desc: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The render makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.

actions.name: ClawsMelee Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: BiteMelee Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rend the Field (Recharge 5–6).
actions.desc: The render makes a claw attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet of it. A creature hit by this attack must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
